properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Advisory issued February 13 at 3:19PM EST until February 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Moderate accumulation of freezing spray expected.

* WHERE...Casco and Penobscot Bays.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 4 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

NWSheadline: FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY
